trans-unit.source: Provides numerous conversion functions and exposes a GDI+ <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Gir mange konvertering fungerer og viser GDI + <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"> </xref> objektet.

trans-unit.source: This class provides numerous conversion functions and also exposes a GDI+ <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> object.
trans-unit.target: Denne klassen gir mange konvertering fungerer og viser også en GDI + <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>objektet.</xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>

trans-unit.source: Note that when rendering as Scalable Vector Graphics (SVG), use of the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> object for custom drawing will not be included as part of the SVG document.
trans-unit.target: Merk at når gjengis som vektor grafikk (SVG Scalable), bruk av den <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>objekt for egendefinert tegning er ikke inkludert som en del av SVG-dokument.</xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>

trans-unit.source: Note also that, by default, <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> functions usually take absolute coordinates.
trans-unit.target: Merk også at som standard <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>funksjoner tar vanligvis absolutte koordinater.</xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>

trans-unit.source: Therefore the conversion methods of this class should be useful if you perform drawing operations.
trans-unit.target: Konverteringsmetoder av denne klassen bør derfor være nyttig hvis du utfører tegning operasjoner.

trans-unit.source: A ChartGraphics object is exposed in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartPaintEventArgs.ChartGraphics%2A> property of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartPaintEventArgs> class?qualifyHint=False&autoUpgrade=True, which makes it easy to perform custom drawing in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.PrePaint> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.PostPaint> events.
trans-unit.target: Et objekt for ChartGraphics vises i den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartPaintEventArgs.ChartGraphics%2A>for den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartPaintEventArgs>klassen? qualifyHint = False & autoUpgrade = True, som gjør det enkelt å utføre egendefinerte tegning i den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.PrePaint>og <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.PostPaint>hendelser.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.PostPaint> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.PrePaint> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartPaintEventArgs> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartPaintEventArgs.ChartGraphics%2A>

trans-unit.source: > [!IMPORTANT] > If significant changes are made to the default behavior of the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> object, the chart image and its associated elements may be drawn erratically.
trans-unit.target: > [!IMPORTANT] > Hvis betydelige endringer standard virkemåte for den <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>objektet, diagrambildet og tilknyttede elementene kan tegnes uberegnelig.</xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>

trans-unit.source: For example, positioning may be altered.
trans-unit.target: For eksempel kan plassering endres.

trans-unit.source: It is highly recommended that you become well acquainted with GDI+ before you make any significant changes to the properties of the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> object.
trans-unit.target: Det anbefales at du blir også kjent med GDI + før du gjør betydelige endringer i egenskapene til det <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>objektet.</xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>

trans-unit.source: Releases unmanaged and, optionally, managed resources.
trans-unit.target: Versjoner uforvaltet, og eventuelt administreres ressurser.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_True" name="True" href=""></xref> to release both unmanaged and managed resources; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> to release only unmanaged resources.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_True" name="True" href=""></xref>å frigjøre både uforvaltede og behandlede ressurser. <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref> frigi bare uforvaltede ressurser.

trans-unit.source: Takes a <xref href="System.Drawing.PointF"></xref> object and converts its relative coordinates to absolute coordinates.
trans-unit.target: Tar en <xref href="System.Drawing.PointF"> </xref> objekt og konverterer de relative koordinatene til absolutte koordinater.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.PointF"></xref> object in relative coordinates.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Drawing.PointF"> </xref> objektet med relative koordinater.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.PointF"></xref> object in absolute coordinates.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Drawing.PointF"> </xref> objektet i absolutte koordinater.

trans-unit.source: Takes a <xref href="System.Drawing.RectangleF"></xref> object and converts its relative coordinates to absolute coordinates.
trans-unit.target: Tar en <xref href="System.Drawing.RectangleF"> </xref> objekt og konverterer de relative koordinatene til absolutte koordinater.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.RectangleF"></xref> object in relative coordinates.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Drawing.RectangleF"> </xref> objektet med relative koordinater.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.RectangleF"></xref> object in absolute coordinates.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Drawing.RectangleF"> </xref> objektet i absolutte koordinater.

trans-unit.source: Takes a <xref href="System.Drawing.SizeF"></xref> object that uses relative coordinates and returns a <xref href="System.Drawing.SizeF"></xref> object that uses absolute coordinates.
trans-unit.target: Tar en <xref href="System.Drawing.SizeF"> </xref> objekt som bruker relative koordinater og returnerer en <xref href="System.Drawing.SizeF"> </xref> objekt som bruker absolutte koordinater.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.SizeF"></xref> object in relative coordinates.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Drawing.SizeF"> </xref> objektet med relative koordinater.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.SizeF"></xref> object in absolute coordinates.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Drawing.SizeF"> </xref> objektet i absolutte koordinater.

trans-unit.source: Takes a given axis value for a specified axis and returns the relative pixel value.
trans-unit.target: Tar en gitt akseverdi angitte aksen og returnerer verdien relativ pikselbredden.

trans-unit.source: Chart area name.
trans-unit.target: Navnet på diagramområdet.

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.AxisName"></xref> enumeration value that identifies the relevant axis.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.AxisName"> </xref> opplistingsverdien som identifiserer den relevante aksen.

trans-unit.source: The axis value to be converted to a relative pixel value.
trans-unit.target: Akseverdien som skal konverteres til en relativ pikselbredden-verdi.

trans-unit.source: A <xref uid="langword_csharp_string" name="string" href=""></xref> value that represents the converted axis value, in relative pixel coordinates.
trans-unit.target: En <xref uid="langword_csharp_string" name="string" href=""> </xref> verdi som representerer konverterte akseverdi, i pikselbredden relative koordinater.

trans-unit.source: Takes a <xref href="System.Drawing.PointF"></xref> object that uses absolute coordinates and returns a <xref href="System.Drawing.PointF"></xref> object that uses relative coordinates.
trans-unit.target: Tar en <xref href="System.Drawing.PointF"> </xref> objekt som bruker absolutte koordinater og returnerer en <xref href="System.Drawing.PointF"> </xref> objekt som bruker relative koordinater.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.PointF"></xref> object in absolute coordinates.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Drawing.PointF"> </xref> objektet i absolutte koordinater.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.PointF"></xref> object in relative coordinates.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Drawing.PointF"> </xref> objektet med relative koordinater.

trans-unit.source: Takes a <xref href="System.Drawing.RectangleF"></xref> structure that is using absolute coordinates and returns a <xref href="System.Drawing.RectangleF"></xref> object that uses relative coordinates.
trans-unit.target: Tar en <xref href="System.Drawing.RectangleF"> </xref> -strukturen som bruker absolutte koordinater og returnerer en <xref href="System.Drawing.RectangleF"> </xref> objekt som bruker relative koordinater.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.RectangleF"></xref> structure in absolute coordinates.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Drawing.RectangleF"> </xref> strukturen i absolutte koordinater.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.RectangleF"></xref> structure in relative coordinates.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Drawing.RectangleF"> </xref> struktur med relative koordinater.

trans-unit.source: Takes a <xref href="System.Drawing.SizeF"></xref> object in absolute coordinates and returns a <xref href="System.Drawing.SizeF"></xref> object that uses relative coordinates.
trans-unit.target: Tar en <xref href="System.Drawing.SizeF"> </xref> objektet i absolutte koordinatene og returnerer en <xref href="System.Drawing.SizeF"> </xref> objekt som bruker relative koordinater.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.SizeF"></xref> object in absolute coordinates.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Drawing.SizeF"> </xref> objektet i absolutte koordinater.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.SizeF"></xref> object in relative coordinates.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Drawing.SizeF"> </xref> objektet med relative koordinater.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a GDI+ <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"></xref> object that can be used for drawing purposes.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir en GDI + <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"> </xref> objekter som kan brukes for å tegne formål.

trans-unit.source: You can use this property to perform any custom drawing that can be performed using GDI+.
trans-unit.target: Du kan bruke denne egenskapen til å utføre en egendefinert tegning utføres med GDI +.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"></xref> object used for drawing.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"> </xref> objektet brukes til tegning.
